description: Johnathan is a 25 year old blue-eyed stud who one of our scouts initially met at a nightclub.While she was talking to him, she couldn't help but notice his incredible build and sexy blue eyes, and it was then that she knew he would need to be a Next Door Male. Fresh out of school only a year ago, Johnathan is a copy machine salesman and says he loves to spend his time outside of his job by either working out, or partying. We can tell he spends a good deal of time on his body. He's definitely in great shape. We're happy to have him as one of our men here.Johnathan shows us his stuff in three scenes.First in the living room after a long day at work, followed by an early morning 'workout' while he's making coffee in the kitchen. And lastly, he relaxes in bed as he takes a load off.
title: Johnathan
